page.title: 12The Village Hall.
page.content: Together with Church, Chapel and School, the{village hall}at Petham is a focus of a variety of activities. The Church{choir}may use it for practices when convenience dictates. The Primary school hold their indoor {Physical Education}twice a week when weather permits. The local{Brownie group meets there weekly and a{Doctor from Chartham holds his surgery. Young people hold disco{dancing there from time to time and other groups not always directly linked to the village hold dances at weekends. The pre-school{playgroup}holds three morning sessions per-week.{Jumble {sales}are another regular event helping to raise funds for a variety of causes including the cricket club and Guide dogs for the Blind. It is used for{Parish council meetings}and {Concerts}and many other events.
